text: Zdravko (Cyrillic script: Здравко) is a masculine given name of Slavic origin derived from word "zdrav" meaning "healthy". Notable people with the name include: *Zdravko-Ćiro Kovačić, Croat water polo player who competed for Yugoslavia *Zdravko Čolić, Bosnian singer *Zdravko Ježić, Croat water polo player who competed for Yugoslavia in the 1952 Summer Olympics *Zdravko Kuzmanović, Swiss-born Serbian footballer *Zdravko Lazarov, Bulgarian footballer *Zdravko Marjanovic, Canadian psychology researcher, professor *Zdravko Radulović, Montenegrin-born Croatian basketball player *Zdravko Rajkov, Serbian footballer and manager *Zdravko Šotra, Bosnian Serb film director and screenwriter *Zdravko Zdravkov, Bulgarian footballer *Zdravko Cimbaljevic, Human Rights Advocate, and the first out gay man in Montenegro. Now lives in Canada. ==See also== *Slavic names *Zdravkov *Zdravković ==External links== *http://www.behindthename.com/name/zdravko Category:Croatian masculine given names Category:Serbian masculine given names Category:Bosnian masculine given names Category:Bulgarian masculine given names Category:Slovene masculine given names Category:Montenegrin masculine given names Category:Slavic masculine given names
title: Zdravko
